name: DDEKundalini
description:
This game is the sequel of DDEK created by Leonard Neitzel.
In the surrealist and strange point and click experience, you will have the occasion to interact with strange objects and resolve small puzzles in order to go further in the game.

"Game a Week"  (Winter Semester 2020/2021)
